an4.240:4.1: “Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.240:4.3: Hurtful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind, and hurtful view.
an4.240:4.4: Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.240:5.1: Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven.
an4.240:5.3: Pleasing deeds by way of body, speech, and mind, and pleasing view.
an4.240:5.4: Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”
